pkgmetadata.longdescription:
[GitHub Pages](https://jameskabbes.github.io/py_starter)
[PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/kabbes-py-starter)# py_starterHelpful python starter functions for various repository use
# Installation`pip install kabbes_py_starter`
# UsageFor more in-depth documentation, read the information provided on the Pages. Or better yet, read the source code.```pythonimport py_starter as ps``````pythonps.print_for_loop( ['Apple','Strawberry','Banana'] )``````>>> 1. Apple2. Strawberry3. Banana``````pythonps.merge_two_dicts( {'A':'Alpha','C':'Nothing'}, {'B':'Bravo':'C':'Charlie'} )``````>>> {'A':'Alpha','B':'Bravo','C':'Charlie'}```
# AuthorJames Kabbes
